body.name: EASELAND Firm Pillow Shredded Memory Foam(Adjustable Loft), Cooling Breathable for Sleeping Queen Size 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 31 mins
features: ❄️Adjustable Personalized Solution: Our pillows are filled with sufficient shredded memory foam, people can adjust/remove foam acquired individual comfortable experience. It's a highly wise and easy-to-handle solution to meet different sleepers' need.

❄️Cooling Material: We use different materials for pillowcase A/B sides. A side fabric content cooling material, it can wicks away moisture, keep cooling and dry all night long. B side is made with hypoallergenic, breathable bamboo rayon, that's permeable and soft to the touch. Our eco-friendly pillows are made of OEKO-TEX certified materials, please ensure complete peace of mind to use.

❄️Say Goodbye to Flat: We've add ultra-brushed down alternative fibers into pillows, which provide comfort and softness sleep feel. The primary filling--MEMORY FOAM makes the pillow firmer and supportive, that means you'll never feel troubled with The flat pillows again!

❄️Maintenance and Care: Our zippered pillowcases are easy to remove and clean. The luxury, textured pillowcase can increase the cooling effect and help for a more restful sleep. Please note that the memory foam has high absorption, so it's important not to machine wash the inner pillow inserts.

❄️Warm Prompt: For long-distance shipping purpose, EASELAND pillow set are vacuum compressed package. The pillowcases and inner pillows are packaged separately. Please allow several hours for the pillow to regain its fluffiness after unpacking.No worries if it has a slight odor, it's normal with new foam. Allow it to air out for about 1 or 2 days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience Ultimate Relaxation with EASELAND One-third of our life is spent in the bed. That's why choose EASLEAND Bedding. Keeps You Cool and Breathable in All Seasons: Do you get hot and sweaty when sleeping? Our Cooling Pillows can keep cool in hot nights. Moisture-wicking properties can helps regulate temperature for a comfortable sleep.

Double Lining Protect Zippered pillowcases are breathable, cooling, and durable. Double protection to prolong the life of pillow, protect quality sleep every night！ Customized Adjustable Design Supportive and comfort has never been easier. Simply unzip the pillowcase adjust the filling as your personal preferred. What's inside Your Pillow? EASELAND pillow filled with supportive memory foam and soft down alternative. This combination provides the perfect balance of support and softness! Don't hesitate to buy! If you’re looking for comfort bedding, look no further and choose us！ With our pillow, you can enjoy the ultimate sleeping experience every night.

What should I do if the pillow is too PUFFY for me? We've add a generous amount of fillings in the initial pillow to meet the needs of most sleepers. If you feel it's too Puffy or Firm, just simply remove some of the fillings to customize it to your needs. Will the pillow feel cool when sleeping? Our pillows are cooling and breathable, which help to regulate body temperature. It's good choice for night sweats people. Note: Cooling feature's effectiveness may be affected by ambient temperature. It works better in a well-ventilated environment. Can these pillows be washed? Pillowcase is machine washable. DO NOT WASH inner filling (memory foam are strong water absorption).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Side Sleeping Game Changer
reviews.reviewText: I am a side sleeper and find myself buying a new pillow every two months because pillows break down. I’ve tried actual knee pillows and i need closer to 4 inches or more between my knees to not be in pain. Nothing has worked and then i came across this and thought why not as its time for a new pillow anyways. First off i never checked the dimensions on the body pillow and was shocked to receive a pillow nearly as long as my king size bed. I love that i can adjust how firm this pillow is and than it has a cooling top. After a week of using this pillow i absolutely love it. If you have severe injuries that result in life long discomfort this is the pillow for you! I have dislocated knee caps and little cartilage left in my knees, a twisted pelvis and lots of crushed and bulging disks in my back. This pillow has kept me in one place all night and not tossing and turning all night causing my to wake up hurting worse that when i went to bed. Finally wake up feeling refreshed and not in pain. Definitely worth a try for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I sleep with this pillow, not for decoration. It is very firm but still soft and holds its shape. Fluffed up very quickly and there was no smell. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Definitely a great pillow. Outer case is soft and the pillow is a little too firm but is definitely filled with extra stuffing. I took some out and it was perfect. Doesn’t keep my head as cold as I hoped. But still a great pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm and High Quality
reviews.reviewText: Love these pillows! Nice and Firm and very good quality! The other body pillows are so big but these are the perfect size, and I’m 5’6. Great product, so happy I bought 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy but way to full!
reviews.reviewText: So the pillow is awesome…. Only thing is I had to unzip it and pull out a lot of the shredded cushion. After that is was perfect. I kinda like that they overpack it and you can pull some out to get your own desired support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable firm pillow
reviews.reviewText: If you like a nice firm pillow this is the one to buy. The pillows are rolled and compressed for shipping. Once you remove them from the packaging they start to fill out. You can expedite the process by stretching the contents from the center to the edges. If you feel the pillows are too firm you can easily remove as much of the filling as necessary to achieve your desired firmness. The cover is beautifully designed. It is easy to remove and wash as needed. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Less than desired
reviews.reviewText: The pillows are decent over all. However they do not satisfy the “firm” description. After about an hour they are flat as a board. Well packaged and shipped relatively quickly but the gamble was on the ability to maintain firmness over night. They are very comfortable for about 45 minutes to an hour and then I flop and flip and puff and fluff the pillow. Not the best but not as bad as my old pillows. Maybe I set my expectations too high. I just want some decent sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable pillow use ever slept on.
reviews.reviewText: I got these pillows after trying the viral tik tok one. These pillows are by far the most comfortable pillows I've ever laid my head on. My daughter sleeps in my spot when I work, and I had to order her these pillows after she slept on mine. They do have a weird smell when you get them, but it quickly goes away. Came with a cooling pillow case, amazing.
Very thin in the beginning but after a while it gets bigger like the pictures.
